casebody.data:
CORWIN
v.
BRITISH AMERICAN TOBACCO PLC, et al. 56PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2017 Alan W. Duncan, Attorney at Law, Stephen M. Russell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Jason M. Leviton, Attorney at Law, Joel A. Fleming, Attorney at Law, for Corwin, Robert (Dr.), et al. Michael L. Robinson, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, H. Brent Helms, Attorney at Law, Gary A. Bornstein, Attorney at Law, for British American Tobacco PLC. Ronald R. Davis, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, W. Andrew Copenhaver, Attorney at Law, James A. Dean, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Robert C. Micheletto, Attorney at Law, Thomas E. Lynch, Attorney at Law, Andrew S. Kleinfeld, Attorney at Law, for Reynolds American, Inc., et al. James P. McLoughlin, Jr., Attorney at Law, Mark A. Nebrig, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Watkins, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Karen Seymour, Attorney at Law, *727Frank Schall, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Jobin, Luc, et al. Alan M. Ruley, Attorney at Law, William K. Davis, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for North Carolina Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of August 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 5th day of September 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
